title: Missing Animations
body:
Hi, I can't see Nidalee's swipe, it is just invisible to me. I also can't see the timers from Yasuo's e or Thresh's lantern. Also Kalista's passive arrow thingy doesn't show either.

I have reinstalled, repaired etc and nothing works, help!

replies.body:
Been getting the same issues, except I can't see Nidalee's spears or Cassiopeia's poison cloud! It was extremely frustrating.

Thing is though, after a fresh install, everything was fine. Have you checked your r3d logs?
